p: The niches of California and central Chile were significantly more similar than chance (D = 0.428; Figure 1), from California to central Chile (P = 0.001) and from central Chile to California (P = 0.04). More specifically, the niche in central Chile was almost completely included (nested) within the Californian niche (S = 0.993) ( Figure 1). Moreover, the native climatic niche includes a space not shared with the climatic niche in the invaded range (U = 0.532) and the climatic niche of central Chile had a reduced expansion (E = 0.006) ( Figure 1).
